short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for displaying heap analytics in the console

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to ensure that your heap analytics events are firing and you are identifying the user correctly? Use the heap analytics debugger to receive that information instantly your developer consoler rather than going all the way to your heap dashboard, wait a few minutes for the cache to clear, then repeat results.

The heap analytics debugger tool makes it easy to show your events are firing as expect! Simply open your console and information about the user's identity, user properties, event, and event properties will display.

For more information check the website documentation:

https://ericsonmichaelj.github.io/Heap-Chrome-Extension/

Please Note: This is an open source project that is no way associated with heapanalytics.com.
